summary: Odysseus, also known as Ulysses, is a famous character in ancient Greek and Roman myths. He was the clever king of Ithaca, a Greek island. Homer's epic poem, the *Odyssey*, tells the story of his long journey home after the Trojan War. This trip took ten years and was full of exciting adventures. Odysseus is known for his smart strategies and tricks, earning him the title "Odysseus the Cunning." He was also an important figure in other mythological tales, including the *Iliad*.
title: Odysseus
